channel.title: Moparscape IRC
channel.description:
I didn't really know which section to post this in, but this gets the most views it seems. So any mod that wants to move it, feel free.
NOTE: THE BEST WAY TO GET AWAY FROM FLAMERS, IS /ignore name!
e.g.:
[code] —› join: (Moparscaper) (Moparscaper) Hi (RandomFlamingFag) GTFO FGT /ignore RandomFlamingFag [/code]
After you /ignore someone you won't see any actions they do.
Seeing as how moparscape has TONS upon TONS of members, I'd like to try to make #moparscape active, since there's definately enough members for it.
I want to get the moparscape channel being active, and a place to help each other. I'm currently an operator in there, and there's not really any discussion in there anymore.
I know some of you are thinking "Well, I went there once and people flamed me", well, I won't let that happen.
If you seem like you are willing to learn, I'll make sure no one says anything to you..at least in that channel, (I can't control PMs, sorry).
I would really like to make the channel educational to everyone here at moparscape.
Server: irc.moparisthebest.com or irc.deltaanime.net Port: 6667 channel: #moparscape
some IRC clients: [url=http://www.efnet.org/clients/win32/mirc/mirc631.exe]mIRC[/url] [url=http://www.nnscript.com/index.php?section=download]No Name Script[/url] [url=http://xchat.org/download/]X-Chat (Free for linux users, Windows users I'd recommend X-Chat 2)[/url] [url=http://www.silverex.org/download/]X-Chat 2[/url]
Hope to see you all there, I'm willing to try to make this work, hopefully some others are too.
Any questions, please, post here, or if you would rather, you can PM me.

item.title: Moparscape IRC
item.dc:creator: @kando2 kando2
item.description:
@kando2 wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:10, topic:158130”][quote author=kando2 link=topic=215541.msg1879424#msg1879424 date=1194917969]
I glad to see your helping moparscape.
But it won’t change the fact that atleast someone will come
and get flammed.

But I dont get why mitb people hate moparscape.
It’s like slavery, white people did to the black people.

[/quote]

You’re forgetting that most moparscapers are fucking retards, and so bring it upon themselves.[/quote]

Well sure some one but other wants to learn.
The way that everyone came from runescape to moparscape then to moparisthebest. The fact that you were once a moparscaper and runescaper.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape IRC
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I’ll try get my original moparscape irc topic revived by moparisthebest since he was the one who asked me to make it the first time when i decided to get the #moparscape channel used (before ANYONE was ever in it :P).

[quote=“kando2, post:9, topic:158130”]I glad to see your helping moparscape.
But it won’t change the fact that atleast someone will come
and get flammed.

But I dont get why mitb people hate moparscape.
It’s like slavery, white people did to the black people.[/quote]
/ignore name

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape IRC
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

X-J-K-X, I can’t really do anything about c|p, but, what you can do, is “/ignore c|p” and it’ll make it so you can’t see any of the bullshit he says

I’ve had to do it to a few people.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape IRC
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:6, topic:158130”]Lol, with the people in that channel, you won’t get many people joining -.-… On the forums they can be alright, n actually talk to you, but when people actually want to learn, and come in to see what it’s like, they like “ZUMFG MAN WTF A MOPARSCAPIAN ZUMFG ZOMOFMGOMOM ZOMFOMOGMOMZ OMG GTFO!O???” …

So i cba… I tried 4 times.[/quote]

Apparantly you were a retard earlier, and deserved the flaming you got.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape IRC
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Well, they shouldn’t because #moparscape IS for moparscapers…#mopar is for mitb.

So if they go to #mopar and get flamed, that’s on them, but if someone from #mopar comes into #moparscape and flames them, I’ll take action

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape IRC
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Excuse me while I ror, ahem:

ROROROROROROOROROROROROROROROROROROROROROROOROROROROOROROROROROROROOR, etc.

Yes #moparscape has been dead in the past few weeks. Yes it needs more people to liven it up. But moparscapers? I think not. Mitb-ers go in there a lot, and yes, the moparscapers that go in WILL get flamed. Trust me, they will.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

I didn’t really know which section to post this in, but this gets the most views it seems. So any mod that wants to move it, feel free.

NOTE: THE BEST WAY TO GET AWAY FROM FLAMERS, IS /ignore name!

e.g.:

—› join: (Moparscaper)
(Moparscaper) Hi
(RandomFlamingFag) GTFO FGT

After you /ignore someone you won’t see any actions they do.

Seeing as how moparscape has TONS upon TONS of members, I’d like to try to make #moparscape active, since there’s definately enough members for it.

I want to get the moparscape channel being active, and a place to help each other. I’m currently an operator in there, and there’s not really any discussion in there anymore.
